title.rendered: THE TEN SPOT yonge and lawrence

content.rendered:
beauty bar in yonge and lawrence | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar on yonge + lawrence, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in yonge and lawrence | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 3324 yonge street toronto, on
  • 647-345-3324
  • yongeandlawrence@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon.: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

tue. - fri: 9:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat. - sun: 9:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

The Ten Spot at 3324 Yonge Street is such a welcoming place which is very clean and very comfortable. My favourite thing about it is the staff. Every time I go there, I feel like I am an old friend stopping in for a visit. No matter who is... helping me, they are always warm and friendly and professional. This is not a pretentious salon that tries to sell you products. This is a professional business that does a great job while allowing you to feel relaxed and comfortable in a truly lovely environment. Thank you!read more
Marla Saksznajder
1718897816
I love this spa, all of the women are amazing!! They are professional, kind hearted and they always go above and beyond. I’ve gotten brow tints, manicures, pedicures and I get my brazilly done here. Tracy N did my brazilly she made me feel so... comfortable and I can tell she is well educated in her field. I would highly recommend seeing her!read more
Vashti Wisdom
1718388702
Love this location and the service I got. Their team is professional and the location is spotless and clean. Very friendly staff. Today I got a shellac manicure in white, white is really hard to do and often shows bumps, streaks etc. my manicure was... the best I’ve had done and my nails are shaped to perfection. Will definitely rebook. Highly recommend the Ten Spot - Lawrence.read more
Barb Mammoliti
1716837071
I've been going to this Ten Spot location for the last two years or so and have never been disappointed. The staff are friendly, vibrant and interesting to talk to, and knowledgeable and skilled in the services they offer. I would recommend them... to any of my friends or family!read more
Kimberly Eberwine
1713565838
I started taking my preteen daughter to this location for upper lip threading and our experience has been absolutely phenomenal with Carly. We live 20 minutes away with many other places to go but Carly is worth the drive. She is kind, personable,... attentive and always does a little extra for my daughter. She is very professional and talented too- as my daughter progresses with more services- she will definitely stick with Carly! Thank you! 💕read more
Erica A
1712428303
I normally do my own manicures, but when I need a gel one for travel endurance or looking good when I'm showing my art, I go pro. I have been going to this Ten Spot location routinely for mani / pedi for over 2 years now, and I always feel pampered... and well looked after. Ten Spot at Yonge & Lawrence is always spotless. My previous experiences with some of the other nail bars in North Toronto have been like the stuff of comedy routines. Here, all the aestheticians make me feel like my business is appreciated! They keep track of the colours I use, they know when I have a trip or a show coming up and always ask about them. (And when I mess something up, or the gel doesn't set properly, they fix it without hesitation!) I really appreciate that when I come out of there, I feel like a million bucks! Thanks, Ten Spot Lawrence, you ladies are terrific!!!read more
Lori Ryerson
1709941347
Love going to this location because it’s so close to my work. Everyone is always so welcoming and nice and has a smile on their face right as you walk in. I always get waxing services done from my girl Kyra. She is so efficient and gentle and our... conversations are always so fun, making our sessions always so pleasant.read more
Renee Marie
1707111304
Such a fun and cute location! I’ve been twice for manicure and eyelash lift & tint. Both visits were with Megan B. She is the BEST. My manicure lasts so long every time. They have high quality products and the work by these aestheticians is very... impressive. Each visit the team is so happy to help and support any way they can. Thanks for making my self care even better 🩷read more
Mary Wilson
1705534122
I have been going here since they’ve open this branch after pandemic closures and been a X- Club member for quite some time now. My girl Kyra does the best nail art and Katrina, the owner does the best color-match to all my nail ideas. Always have a... blast going to this place, staff are all friendly and very approachable. I feel like I’m just catching up with my girlfriends whenever I go for an appointment. The place is immaculate too, clean bathrooms, waxing rooms, mani and pedi stations. 5 out 5 recommend!read more
marjorie tacud
1703802061
All of the staff at this Ten Spot location are friendly, professional, and provide quality services. Also, I have always found the location to be clean and well-sanitized & well-organized.I usually have my spa services completed by Carly and... Alyssa, and I always love the results! On top of liking my spa service results, the location provides excellent customer service, communication, and (when needed) spa service suggestions. Thanks also to Sam at the front desk!Highly recommend this Ten Spot location!read more
Melinda Zack
1702401163
I had an anti aging facial done by ilgin and it was absolutely phenomenal! She walked me through step by step what she was doing and putting on my face as she went, she was super gentle and made me feel very comfortable. All the products felt and... smelled great. Also lovely ladies at the front desk, super friendly and welcoming. I will definitely be returning!read more
Colie Ray
1699369549
I had the best facial ever! Alyssa was exceptional. She was thorough, gentle, and told you what she was doing every step of the way. I was so relaxed by the time she was done. Shout out to Katrina and her team. This Ten Spot location is... relaxing comfortable and the staff are friendly thoughtful and kind. I highly recommend them. My go to is Alyssa!read more
Florence Lee
1699127387
‹
›
